snippet: An armed man stole several cars, quickly abandoning each before trying to take another, the police said, but it was not clear what prompted his actions.
abstract: Police arrest Nicolas Almonte, who is suspected of having taken at least three luxury vehicles at gunpoint, trying to steal a van, robbing a man of his cash on Queens street and trying to wrest keys from a woman walking her dog; it is unclear what set off the spree or why each car was abandoned so quickly.
lead_paragraph: An armed man stole several cars, quickly abandoning each before trying to take another, the police said, but it was not clear what prompted his actions.

headline.seo: Spree of Queens Carjackings Ends in an Arrest Hours Later
headline.main: Spree of Carjackings Ends With an Arrest Hours Later
headline.print_headline: Spree of Carjackings Ends With an Arrest Hours Later
